features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User registration, login, and JWT-based authentication with bcrypt password hashing

features.name: Room Management
features.description: Create, join, and manage rooms with optional password protection and real-time user count

features.name: Clipboard Sharing
features.description: Real-time text and file sharing between users in rooms with expiration and history

features.name: QR Code Integration
features.description: Generate and scan QR codes for easy room access and sharing

features.name: Real-time Communication
features.description: WebSocket-based real-time updates for user count, messages, and file sharing

features.name: File Upload System
features.description: Drag-and-drop file uploads with progress tracking and file type validation

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Dark/light theme switching with system preference detection and persistent storage

features.name: Mobile Responsiveness
features.description: Mobile-first design with touch-friendly interfaces and responsive layouts

features.name: Data Management
features.description: React Query integration for server state management, caching, and optimistic updates

features.name: Storage System
features.description: Database operations for users, rooms, clipboard data, and file metadata with Drizzle ORM

features.name: Security Features
features.description: Room password protection, JWT token validation, and secure file handling

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Comprehensive set of reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Routing System
features.description: Client-side routing with Wouter for navigation between home, room, and error pages

features.name: Development Tools
features.description: Vite development server with hot reload, TypeScript compilation, and build optimization
